channel.title: IRL on StandingPad's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in IRL on StandingPad's Corner

item.title: Moving On
item.description: Hi guys, I think yall might be confused why I’ve created a new website, let’s talk about it. But first, what’s been going on recently? Well in short, chaos. The actual situation is much longer, but to put it simply Twitter is no longer (in my opinion) a sustainable platform to remain on, so I moved to Mastodon. Now because Mastodon allows you to verify your own sites, I’ve gone ahead and made this new one, since I felt like it.
